newsArray.title: Korean footballer banned in China cleared to play elsewhere following FIFA decision
creator: yonhap@koreatimes.co.kr(KoreaTimes)
newsArray.description: Korean football player Son Jun-ho, banned for life in China over match-fixing charges, has been cleared to play elsewhere by FIFA, the national football federation here said Friday.

newsArray.title: Ex-Barća star, Jordi Alba names worst player he played against
creator: John Owen Nwachukwu
newsArray.description: Inter Miami defender, Jordi Alba, has claimed that Argentina football icon, Angel di Maria was the worst player to play against. The former Barcelona defender stated that Di Maria is a year older than him but is still going strong.
